creator.organizationName: University of Rostock, Biolological Station Zingst, Mühlenstraße 27, D 18374 Zingst

metadataProvider.organizationName: University of Rostock, Biolological Station Zingst, Mühlenstraße 27, D 18374 Zingst

section.para: Contains data on plankton organisms derived by microscopy. Bacteria are cell numbers, phytoplankton is biovolume per water volume and zooplankton is fresh mass per volume and taxonomical groups. Data set is incomplete as counting takes much more time.

section.title: Dataset access and use constraints
section.para: Principal:EnvEurope (LTER-Europe) has granted a permission of type:Free for access and use upon request

section.title: Dataset legal obligation reporting
section.para: none, all our own scientific interest
The data provider must be offered co-authorship for publications using this dataset at least within the metadata description
Formal acknowledgement of the dataset providers
The opportunity to collaborate on the project using the dataset
The opportunity to review the results based on the dataset
Reprints of articles using the dataset must be provided to the data provider
The dataset provider is given a complete list of all products that make use of the dataset

contact.organizationName: University of Rostock, Biolological Station Zingst, Mühlenstraße 27, D 18374 Zingst

para.literalLayout: Microscopy of fixed samples concentrated by filtration and sedimentation.

section.para: bacteria: full sample fixed by glutaraldehyde. 20 ml, 0.5 ml prepared for counting, 400 cells counted. algae: full sample fixed by Lugol. 20 ml, 0.2- 1 ml sedimented in a 3 ml chamber. 100 cells counted per dominating species. zooplankton: net sdample of 5 l concnetrated within 100 ml. counted for large species and stages. full sample of 1 l concentrated by sedimentation within 100 ml. 10 ml - all counted.
